fractal.response module

fractal.response.check_response(res, expected_status_code=200, coerce=False)[source]

Check the validity of the http response from fractal server

If the status code of the response is not one of the expected values, print the error to stderr and terminate with exit status 1.

On success, optionally coerce to a pydantic model
